overview: At the Mooresex Psychiatric Center the patients consist of women on the verge, the verge of collapse. Candy is an unstoppable nymphomaniac; Sheila is a depressed writer obsessed with Candy. Courtney is caught in the middle, where she's perfectly happy. Remember, all's fair in sex and lust unless, of course, you're not playing with a full deck, then everything and everyone is up for grabs.
title: Uninhibited Girl
